== Meppayyur (CT) (627390) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Meppayyur (CT) is a town in the [[Quilandy]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 10.58 sq. km. and harbouring 3265 households with total population of 13922 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 50 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 485 km. Male population is 6491 and female population is 7431. Scheduled Caste population is 846 and Scheduled Tribes population is 22. Census Location Code of the town is 627390<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (Population 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 50 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 50 km. Railway station is at Quilandy at a distance of 20 km.
